name: Aberline - Chapter 3: Test and Training
description:
Aberline is a free RPG Adventure game with anime graphic style which is divided into Chapters with different titles for each chapter, and each chapter can be played for approximately 2 to 3 hours.

Aberline - Chapter 3 : "Test and Training" continue the previous adventure that you can see in Chapter I and II, hope you will enjoy it too.

This game still has some things to improve, your constructive feedback will be very valuable for us.
